ygData.subject: RE: Looking for spellcomponents
ygData.msgSnippet: i am a warrior (recently gave my wiz a vacation) and i constantly auction off words and runes and pages etc tec for usually 1-5 plat depending on how rare ive
ygData.messageBody:
i am a warrior (recently gave my wiz a vacation) and i constantly auction
off words and runes and pages etc tec for usually 1-5 plat depending on how
rare ive seen em... most of the time i sell em for about 2 plat...
it just depends on how ard and where you look... mpostly these items will
com off of lev 16+ critters so keep killing them and if you fiond some that
give words and such keep killing them they should be on the same random
table as the runes...

Dillgaar
Gnomish Warrior of the 13th blade

-----Original Message-----
From: Vincent, Chih Yuan, Goh [mailto:wacs@...]
Sent: Friday, July 23, 1999 9:51 AM
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Looking for spellcomponents


From: "Vincent, Chih Yuan, Goh" <wacs@...>

Well, its actually not true. I'm a lvl28 Wiz on Bristel. I have 2 trunk
full of words, LOTS of words, and destroyed countless words till date....all
I get are WORDS and occasional pages, but soooo rarely runes (which I need)!
I think either Verant is really trying to get people to trade for research
components or they got the 'spawn specifics' screwed up. The thing/fact
bout trading is that people rather destroy or sell to merchants than auction
em of for 1pp.
-----Original Message-----
From: Martin Matthiesen <matthiesenm@...>
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, July 20, 1999 7:31 AM
Subject: [EQ_spell_research] Looking for spellcomponents


>From: "Martin Matthiesen" <matthiesenm@...>
>
>I play a level 29 Magician named Eldran on Cazic Thule. In order to do my
>research I was looking for components. The problem I encountered was that
>the components needed are very rare which I think put Magicians at a
>disadvantage when it comes to research. In all my travels I have not come
>across a single spell component besides words. I think they should either
>increase the spawn rate for these items or, which would be even better, put
>a vendor, maybe a bit out of the way, into the game that sells these
>components. Another suggestion I believe that should be considered is to
>make the necro and mage words look different. I plan on starting a petition
>towards this end and would apprerciate any hints or suggestions towards
>this.
>
>PS: If anybody can give me a hint where to find these components or has
some
>to sell that would also be greatly appreciated.
>
>Eldran
>
>
